trustfund:
TF021628-UNWIND INSOLVENT FUND RAISERS,TF021117-SWISS GRANT-UNWINDING OF
            INSOLVENT FUND RAISERS IN ALBANIA

abstracts.cdata!:
The main purpose of the project is to
            improve the government's ability to formulate and
            implement reforms in three critically important areas,
            namely macroeconomic management, enterprise restructuring
            and privatization, and financial sector reform. As a
            by-product, it is also expected to contribute directly to
            the preparation and execution of the proposed Enterprise and
            Financial Sector Adjustment Credit. The project will finance
            high-priority activities of technical assistance in a few
            key economic reform areas. Specifically, it will finance
            resident experts and short-term consultants, studies,
            training and limited amounts of equipment in three areas:
            (a) macroeconomic management; (b) privatization and public
            enterprise reform; and (c) banking sector reform and development.
